name: httpsier
description: Tiny HTTP tunnel for local development using Cloudflare Workers. Proxies public traffic from a subdomain to your local server via WebSocket.

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --external:ws --outfile=dist/index.js --banner:js='#!/usr/bin/env node' && npm run build:types
scripts.format: npm run lint:fix && npm run cs:fix
scripts.test: npm run build && node --test worker/tests/**/*.test.js src/tests/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run build && node --test --watch worker/tests/**/*.test.js src/tests/**/*.test.js

author: Ivan Mezentsev
